snippet: Prosecutors and lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev are sparring over whether an agreement about communication with him in prison should continue now that he has been convicted.
abstract: Prosecutors in case of Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev have requested right to review records of defense team meetings with Tsarnaev, given that he has been convicted; defense argues material should remain private as they prepare appeal.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors and lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev are sparring over whether an agreement about communication with him in prison should continue now that he has been convicted.

headline.main: Boston Marathon Bomber’s Lawyers Fight to Keep Records Private
headline.print_headline: Marathon Bomber’s Lawyers Fight to Keep Records Private
